org.apache.ambari.server.checks

Class KerberosAdminPersistedCredentialCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.checks.ClusterCheck
      • org.apache.ambari.server.checks.KerberosAdminPersistedCredentialCheck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.ambari.spi.upgrade.UpgradeCheck

    public class KerberosAdminPersistedCredentialCheck
extends ClusterCheck
    The KerberosAdminPersistedCredentialCheck class is used to check that the Kerberos administrator credentials are stored in the persisted credential store when Kerberos is enabled.

    This is needed so that if Kerberos principals and/or keytab files need to be created during a stack upgrade, the KDC administrator credentials are guaranteed to be available. If the temporary store is used, the credential may have expired before needed.

        public Set<String> getApplicableServices()
